newsitem.title: USA: American Medserve unit buys pharmacy business.
newsitem.headline: American Medserve unit buys pharmacy business.

text.p: American Medserve Corp said Tuesday that its Williamson Drug Co Inc subsidiary acquired the institutional pharmacy business of Lakeside Pharmacy Inc based in Richmond, Va.

"The addition of the Lakeside Pharmacy institutional business enables us to more efficiently serve the needs of our customers in the Richmond area as we continue the expansion and development of our pharmacy network throughout the Commonwealth of Virginia," said Nelson Showalter, chief executive of Williamson Drug, based in Harrisonburg, Va.
American Medserve provides pharmacy services to about 43,000 residents of more than 600 long-term care facilities and assisted living sites in nine states.
Williamson Drug has seven pharmacies serving over 7,000
